title: Maximizing Your Homestead for Profit & Production with Joel Salatin
itunes:title: Maximizing Your Homestead for Profit & Production with Joel Salatin
description: Sit down with Joel Salatin and me as we discuss methods for increasing the profits from your homestead, different methods for earning a living from your homestead, and ways to increase production (even on a small homestead). We also discuss the best animals and practices for regenerative agriculture and improving the land WITH your animals for both the health of the animal and the land. For more information, visit melissaknorris.com/308.
